Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific User Story to the current Sprint

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Decision to assign a specific Worker to a specific Task

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: Set the priority level for a Feature, where a higher number means higher priority

Name: set_user_story_points
Description: Estimate the story points for a User Story from a Fibonacci-like sequence

Name: select_team_for_project
Description: Categorical decision on which Team (ID) to assign to a Project

Name: set_sprint_duration_weeks
Description: Decide the length of a sprint in full weeks

Name: include_feature_in_release
Description: Binary decision whether to include a Feature in a specific Release Plan

Name: set_task_effort_hours
Description: Estimate the effort in hours for a Task

Name: prioritize_blocker_resolution
Description: Binary decision indicating if a Blocker is to be actively worked on for resolution

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Decision to assign a specific Worker to a specific Team

Name: set_blocker_severity
Description: Set the severity level for a Blocker

Name: set_project_budget
Description: Set the initial budget for a project

Name: define_task_type
Description: Define the type of a task (e.g., for categorization and reporting)
